languages.text: "Вы, кажется, желаете сравнить, чей статус более весом? Извольте". {n}Калькасар демонстрирует инквизиторскую розетту.{/n} "Своей властью и именем {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терры{/g} я мобилизую династию фон Валанциус во имя защиты {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g} от множественных угроз, как внешних, так и внутренних. {name} фон Валанциус, вам надлежит в готовности ожидать распоряжений Инквизиции и приступить к их исполнению немедленно по получении таковых. В случае ослушания вы будете объявлены предател{mf|ем|ьницей} Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Ох уж эти Вольные Торговцы". {n}Лорд-инквизитор тяжело вздыхает.{/n} "Хорошо, я объясню проще: выбора у вас нет".

languages.text: "I take it you wish to see whose status carries greater weight? I am willing to oblige." {n}Calcazar presents to you his Inquisitorial rosette.{/n} "By the power vested in me and in the name of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, I hereby conscript House von Valancius in the name of protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from numerous threats both internal and external. {name} von Valancius, you are to stand by and await the Inquisition's orders, with which you are to comply immediately upon receiving. Should you disobey, you will be pronounced a traitor to the Imperium."
languages.original_text: "Вы, кажется, желаете сравнить, чей статус более весом? Извольте". {n}Калькасар демонстрирует инквизиторскую розетту.{/n} "Своей властью и именем {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Терры{/g} я мобилизую династию фон Валанциус во имя защиты {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора Коронус{/g} от множественных угроз, как внешних, так и внутренних. {name} фон Валанциус, вам надлежит в готовности ожидать распоряжений Инквизиции и приступить к их исполнению немедленно по получении таковых. В случае ослушания вы будете объявлены предател{mf|ем|ьницей} Империума".

traits.locale_text: "I take it you wish to compare whose status carries greater weight? I am happy to oblige." {n}Xavier presents to you his Inquisitorial rosette.{/n} "By the power vested in me and in the name of Terra, I hereby conscript House von Valancius in the name of protecting the Koronus Expanse from numerous threats both internal and external. {name} von Valancius, you are to stand by and await the Inquisition's orders, with which you are to comply immediately upon receiving. Should you disobey, you will be pronounced a traitor to the Imperium."

"I take it you wish to compare whose status carries greater weight? Should you disobey, you will be pronounced a traitor to the Imperium."

"I take it you wish to see whose status carries greater weight? I am willing to oblige." {n}Calcazar presents to you his Inquisitorial rosette.{/n} "By the power vested in me and in the name of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, I hereby conscript House von Valancius in the name of protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from numerous threats both internal and external. {name} von Valancius, you are to stand by and await the Inquisition's orders, with which you are to comply immediately upon receiving. Should you disobey, you will be pronounced a traitor to the Imperium."

languages.text: 「誰の地位がより重いものなのか、知りたいと？望みどおりにしてやろう」{n}カルカサルが異端審問庁のロゼットを差し出す。{/n}「私の力と{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}地球{/g}の名において、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を内外の重大な脅威より防衛するという名目で、ここにフォン・ヴァランシウス家を徴兵する。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス、お前は異端審問庁の命令に備えて待機し、命令が下った際にはただちに遂行せよ。万一命令に背いた場合、帝国への謀反人と宣告する」
languages.original_text: "I take it you wish to see whose status carries greater weight? I am willing to oblige." {n}Calcazar presents to you his Inquisitorial rosette.{/n} "By the power vested in me and in the name of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, I hereby conscript House von Valancius in the name of protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from numerous threats both internal and external. {name} von Valancius, you are to stand by and await the Inquisition's orders, with which you are to comply immediately upon receiving. Should you disobey, you will be pronounced a traitor to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: 「誰の地位がより重いものなのか、知りたいと？望みどおりにしてやろう」{n}カルカサルが異端審問庁のロゼットを差し出す。{/n}「私の力と{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}地球{/g}の名において、{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}を内外の重大な脅威より防衛するという名目で、ここにフォン・ヴァランシウス家を徴兵する。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス、お前は異端審問庁の命令に備えて待機し、命令が下った際にはただちに遂行せよ。万一命令に背いた場合、帝国への謀反人と宣告する」

languages.original_text: "I take it you wish to see whose status carries greater weight? I am willing to oblige." {n}Calcazar presents to you his Inquisitorial rosette.{/n} "By the power vested in me and in the name of Terra, I hereby conscript House von Valancius in the name of protecting the Koronus Expanse from numerous threats both internal and external.  von Valancius, you are to stand by and await the Inquisition's orders, with which you are to comply immediately upon receiving. Should you disobey, you will be pronounced a traitor to the Imperium."

languages.text: “在我看来，你是打算看看我们两人之间谁的地位更高，是吗？我很乐意效劳。”{n}卡尔卡扎亮出了审判官的玫瑰结。{/n}“以赐予我的神圣权力，以及{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}泰拉{/g}之名，我在此征召冯·瓦兰修斯家族，在内忧外患的巨大威胁中保护{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的安全。{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，请静候审判庭的命令，接到命令后立即执行。如有违抗，即视为帝国的叛徒。”
languages.original_text: "I take it you wish to see whose status carries greater weight? I am willing to oblige." {n}Calcazar presents to you his Inquisitorial rosette.{/n} "By the power vested in me and in the name of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, I hereby conscript House von Valancius in the name of protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from numerous threats both internal and external. {name} von Valancius, you are to stand by and await the Inquisition's orders, with which you are to comply immediately upon receiving. Should you disobey, you will be pronounced a traitor to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: “在我看来，你是打算看看我们两人之间谁的地位更高，是吗？我很乐意效劳。”{n}卡尔卡扎亮出了审判官的玫瑰结。{/n}“以赐予我的神圣权力，以及{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}泰拉{/g}之名，我在此征召冯·瓦兰修斯家族，在内忧外患的巨大威胁中保护{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}的安全。{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯，请静候审判庭的命令，接到命令后立即执行。如有违抗，即视为帝国的叛徒。”

languages.text: «¿Quiere ver quién de los dos tiene un estatus más importante? No tengo inconveniente». {n}Calcazar te enseña su roseta de Inquisidor.{/n} «Por el poder que me ha sido concedido y en nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, recluto forzosamente a la casa von Valancius a fin de proteger la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} de numerosas amenazas internas y externas. {name} von Valancius, queda a disposición de la Inquisición y esperará sus órdenes, que cumplirá inmediatamente una vez recibidas. Si desobedece, se considerará un acto de traición al Imperium».
languages.original_text: "I take it you wish to see whose status carries greater weight? I am willing to oblige." {n}Calcazar presents to you his Inquisitorial rosette.{/n} "By the power vested in me and in the name of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, I hereby conscript House von Valancius in the name of protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from numerous threats both internal and external. {name} von Valancius, you are to stand by and await the Inquisition's orders, with which you are to comply immediately upon receiving. Should you disobey, you will be pronounced a traitor to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: «¿Quiere ver quién de los dos tiene un estatus más importante? No tengo inconveniente». {n}Calcazar te enseña su roseta de Inquisidor.{/n} «Por el poder que me ha sido concedido y en nombre de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, recluto forzosamente a la casa von Valancius a fin de proteger la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g} de numerosas amenazas internas y externas. {name} von Valancius, queda a disposición de la Inquisición y esperará sus órdenes, que cumplirá inmediatamente una vez recibidas. Si desobedece, se considerará un acto de traición al Imperium».

languages.text: « J'imagine que vous voulez savoir qui de nous deux a le plus d'autorité sur l'autre ? Permettez-moi de dissiper le malentendu. » {n}Calcazar vous présente son insigne inquisitorial.{/n} « Par les pouvoirs qui me sont conférés et au nom de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, j'ordonne la mobilisation de la maison von Valancius afin de défendre les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} des nombreux dangers, aussi bien externes qu'internes, qui les menacent. {name} von Valancius, vous vous tiendrez dans l'attente des ordres de l'Inquisition, auxquels vous serez {mf|sommé|sommée} d'obéir dès réception. Si vous refusez, vous serez {mf|déclaré traître|déclarée traîtresse} à l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "I take it you wish to see whose status carries greater weight? I am willing to oblige." {n}Calcazar presents to you his Inquisitorial rosette.{/n} "By the power vested in me and in the name of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, I hereby conscript House von Valancius in the name of protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from numerous threats both internal and external. {name} von Valancius, you are to stand by and await the Inquisition's orders, with which you are to comply immediately upon receiving. Should you disobey, you will be pronounced a traitor to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: « J'imagine que vous voulez savoir qui de nous deux a le plus d'autorité sur l'autre ? Permettez-moi de dissiper le malentendu. » {n}Calcazar vous présente son insigne inquisitorial.{/n} « Par les pouvoirs qui me sont conférés et au nom de {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, j'ordonne la mobilisation de la maison von Valancius afin de défendre les {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g} des nombreux dangers, aussi bien externes qu'internes, qui les menacent. {name} von Valancius, vous vous tiendrez dans l'attente des ordres de l'Inquisition, auxquels vous serez {mf|sommé|sommée} d'obéir dès réception. Si vous refusez, vous serez {mf|déclaré traître|déclarée traîtresse} à l'Imperium. »

languages.text: "Ihr wollt also herausfinden, wessen Status mehr Gewicht hat? Ich bin dazu bereit." {n}Calcazar hält dir seine Inquisitorenrosette entgegen.{/n} "Bei der mir verliehenen Macht und im Namen von {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} spreche ich hiermit eine Zwangsverpflichtung des Hauses von Valancius zum Schutz der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} vor diversen internen und externen Bedrohungen aus. {name} von Valancius, Ihr werdet in Bereitschaft bleiben und auf Befehle der Inquisition warten, die ihr dann unmittelbar nach Erhalt ausführen werdet. Solltet Ihr Euch weigern, werdet Ihr {mf|zum Verräter|zur Verräterin} am Imperium erklärt."
languages.original_text: "I take it you wish to see whose status carries greater weight? I am willing to oblige." {n}Calcazar presents to you his Inquisitorial rosette.{/n} "By the power vested in me and in the name of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, I hereby conscript House von Valancius in the name of protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from numerous threats both internal and external. {name} von Valancius, you are to stand by and await the Inquisition's orders, with which you are to comply immediately upon receiving. Should you disobey, you will be pronounced a traitor to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wollt also herausfinden, wessen Status mehr Gewicht hat? Ich bin dazu bereit." {n}Calcazar hält dir seine Inquisitorenrosette entgegen.{/n} "Bei der mir verliehenen Macht und im Namen von {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} spreche ich hiermit eine Zwangsverpflichtung des Hauses von Valancius zum Schutz der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g} vor diversen internen und externen Bedrohungen aus. {name} von Valancius, Ihr werdet in Bereitschaft bleiben und auf Befehle der Inquisition warten, die ihr dann unmittelbar nach Erhalt ausführen werdet. Solltet Ihr Euch weigern, werdet Ihr {mf|zum Verräter|zur Verräterin} am Imperium erklärt."

languages.text: "Kimin statüsü daha ağır basıyor görmek istiyorsun yani? Benim için sakıncası yok." {n}Calcazar, Engizisyon rozetini gösteriyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} adına bana bahşedilen gücü kullanarak von Valancius Hanesi'ni, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'ni{/g} dâhilî ve haricî tehditlere karşı korumakla mükellef kılıyorum. {name} von Valancius; desteğe hazır bulunacak ve Engizisyon'un emirlerini bekleyecek, aldığın emirleri anında uygulayacaksın. İtaat etmediğin durumda bir İmparatorluk haini olarak addedileceksin."
languages.original_text: "I take it you wish to see whose status carries greater weight? I am willing to oblige." {n}Calcazar presents to you his Inquisitorial rosette.{/n} "By the power vested in me and in the name of {g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g}, I hereby conscript House von Valancius in the name of protecting the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g} from numerous threats both internal and external. {name} von Valancius, you are to stand by and await the Inquisition's orders, with which you are to comply immediately upon receiving. Should you disobey, you will be pronounced a traitor to the Imperium."

traits.locale_text: "Kimin statüsü daha ağır basıyor görmek istiyorsun yani? Benim için sakıncası yok." {n}Calcazar, Engizisyon rozetini öne çıkarıyor.{/n} "{g|Encyclopedia:HolyTerra}Terra{/g} adına bana bahşedilen gücü kullanarak von Valancius Hanesi'ni, {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'ni dâhilî ve haricî tehditlere karşı korumakla mükellef kılıyorum. {name} von Valancius, desteğe hazır bulunacak ve Engizisyon'un emirlerini bekleyecek, aldığın emirleri anında uygulayacaksın. İtaat etmediğin durumda bir İmparatorluk haini olarak addedileceksin."
